title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart - Your Ultimate Outdoor Companion!

Crafted with a durable steel frame and robust steel mesh sides, this versatile cart is designed to handle the toughest jobs with ease. The removable side panels offer flexibility, allowing you to convert the cart into a flatbed for even more carrying options. With a whopping 400 lb capacity, there's no task too big for this mighty cart!

Enjoy a quick and effortless assembly process, so you can start using your new cart right away. The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure a smooth ride, even on rough terrain, while the tight turn radius and ample ground clearance provide exceptional maneuverability. The 4-wheel design offers unmatched stability and balance, making it easy to navigate through any landscape.

Measuring 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, the spacious bed provides plenty of room for all your gardening essentials. The straight pull handle allows for easy maneuvering, while the lightweight design (36.6 pounds) ensures effortless transport.

This stylish green cart is not only functional but also visually appealing. Plus, with the added peace of mind of a 1-year limited warranty, you can trust in the quality and durability of your investment.

Upgrade your gardening game with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart - the perfect combination of strength, versatility, and convenience!
